title: Step 1: Add “Create Instance” entry point button to the existing Whisper shell (no backend)

requirements.text: Add a visible “Create Instance” entry point on the existing WhisperDavenport-IA frontend shell (no backend integration yet). Place it in the primary UI (e.g., header actions area near the existing “Connect” button, and/or in a prominent section of the main page) so users can discover the citizen-led instance creation flow.

quotes: Start with step 1 of recommended list

acceptanceCriteria: A button or link labeled exactly “Create Instance” is visible on the main app shell without requiring navigation or authentication.
Clicking “Create Instance” does not call the backend and does not require any canister changes.
The entry point is styled consistently with the existing theme (Tailwind + shadcn components already used in App.tsx).

requirements.text: Implement a minimal UI response for the “Create Instance” entry point (UI-only). On click, show a lightweight placeholder view (modal/dialog/sheet or inline panel) that clearly states that instance creation will be implemented in the next step, and includes a brief plain-language description of what an “instance” is (city/county/state Whisper site).

quotes: Start with step 1 of recommended list

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking “Create Instance” opens a placeholder UI (modal/dialog/sheet/inline card) without navigating away or breaking the page layout.
The placeholder contains English user-facing text that mentions city/county/state as possible instance levels.
The placeholder UI can be dismissed/closed and returns the user to the main shell state.
No form fields, duplicate checks, registry calls, or admin screens are implemented in this step.

constraints: Do not modify any frontend files under the immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
This step must be frontend-only: do not add Motoko canister methods, do not update backend/main.mo, and do not add deployment/dfx steps for this slice.

Do not rebuild or alter unrelated planned features (AI assistant, issue reporting, Issue Projects, user roles/verification, dashboards, tokenomics/WSP) beyond what is strictly necessary to display the new button and placeholder UI.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Connecting the UI to any backend actor calls.
Verification gating (verified_basic) and any authentication changes.
Notifications to admins or WSP rewards hooks.
